descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases ATK by **12%**. Performing Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation increases Resonance Liberation DMG by **24%** for 6s. Dealing Heavy Attack DMG extends this effect by 4s, up to 1 time. Each successful extension gives **24%** Fusion DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
